short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Brings Visual Student Roster feature to MyWSU

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For Wichita State University Faculty -- this extension allows Shocker Faculty to print a visual student roster.

Open the Banner course list, select a course, then click the extension. Wait a few seconds and your roster should print. Either print it or save it as PDF.

** If you have more than 100 students, you'll need to print them 100 at a time by clicking the ">" button at the bottom of the class list, as Banner only supports 100 entries per page.

*** If you use a content blocker, please be sure to whitelist wichita.edu in order for this to work!

**** Finally, if you have problems, please let me (John Hammond) know.  It's a fragile hack that relies on Banner working the way it does right now (including some entries that are misspelled!).  Please be patient :-) 

The source code is available at https://github.com/jmhammond/visual-student-roster
